channel.title: Spare 5 mins for these 2 quick questions:
channel.description:
How do i code it so that trapdoors/gates/fences/doors or similar opens???
I always get this problem... i'm running "Shadowscape" (tried about 8 different sources personally feel this is the easiest for a newb) and when i log out it never saves my position or skills or anything... and while runnning the server constantly says "test2: error writing file" (i logged in as test2). I suppose i must edit a file path or something... btw this is the directory of Shadowscape "D:\Documents and Settings\Packard Bell\Desktop\Shadowscape" and character folder: "D:\Documents and Settings\Packard Bell\Desktop\Shadowscape\characters" any help?
Also when i log out it says: "could not save for test2"

yeah at what part show me the exact code to edit and what too.

item.title: Spare 5 mins for these 2 quick questions:
item.dc:creator: @Brandon1 -Brandon-
item.description:
@Brandon1 wrote:

ok open um client.java
press ctrl + h put in the first box

D:\Documents and Settings\Packard Bell\Desktop\Shadowscape

now in the secound box but

C:\Documents and Settings\USERNAME\Desktop\Shadowscape

hope i helped you

Read full topic
